title: Ticket #3070: possible error in /etc/init/d/condor
description:
I think a line should be changed in the init script coming with the RPM Condor installation I found this in condor.x86_64 7.8.1-43996 (I know 7.7 has the same code, maybe also earlier versions)

In the function condor_master_pids() I think the line 

  foundpid=`$PS | grep condor_master | grep -v grep | $AWK '{print $2}' | grep "^$masterpid$"`
should be 
  foundpid=`$PS $OPTS | grep condor_master | grep -v grep | $AWK '{print $2}' | grep "^$masterpid$"`

Best, Marco
creator: marco
